jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
We are a team of "green" creatives looking for an intern in Graphic Design. Our project focuses on marrying technology with the arts to revolutionize the world's energy supply. You would be joining the renown environmental artist Mileece I'anson and her team whilst working in association with Mileece's father, Nick Abson, who pioneered the largest fuel cell company in Europe. This is a great opportunity to use your skills to heighten the marketing interest of a potentially ground-breaking project, whilst gaining experience from leading figures in this field.

We are looking for vibrant creatives to be part of this fundamental green energy movement. The internship would last a month with potential extension into paid work.

We are a team of "green" creatives looking for an intern in Graphic Design. Our project focuses on marrying technology with the arts to revolutionize the world's energy supply. You would be joining the renown environmental artist Mileece I'anson and her team whilst working in association with Mileece's father, Nick Abson, who pioneered the largest fuel cell company in Europe. This is a great opportunity to use your skills to heighten the marketing interest of a potentially ground-breaking project, whilst gaining experience from leading figures in this field.

We are looking for vibrant creatives to be part of this fundamental green energy movement. The internship would last a month with potential extension into paid work.

jobs.title: Social Media Intern
jobs.description:
We are a team of "green" creatives looking for an intern in Social Media and marketing. You would be joining the renown environmental artist Mileece I'anson and her team whilst working in association with Mileece's father, Nick Abson, who pioneered the largest fuel cell company in Europe. This is a great opportunity to use your skills to heighten the marketing interest of an organisation that merges the arts with technology, to create innovative bio-technologies whilst gaining experience from leading figures in the field. 

We are looking for enthusiastic and vibrant creatives to be part of this fundamental green movement in order to help us get our brand out there and bring our work to the publics attention. The internship would last a month with potential extension into paid work.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are a team of "green" creatives looking for an intern in Social Media and marketing. You would be joining the renown environmental artist Mileece I'anson and her team whilst working in association with Mileece's father, Nick Abson, who pioneered the largest fuel cell company in Europe. This is a great opportunity to use your skills to heighten the marketing interest of an organisation that merges the arts with technology, to create innovative bio-technologies whilst gaining experience from leading figures in the field.

We are looking for enthusiastic and vibrant creatives to be part of this fundamental green movement in order to help us get our brand out there and bring our work to the publics attention. The internship would last a month with potential extension into paid work.

jobs.title: Business Developer Intern
jobs.description:
We are a team of "green" creatives looking for an intern in Business Development Our project focuses on marrying technology with the arts to revolutionize the world's energy supply and how we interact with our living environment. You would be joining the renown environmental artist Mileece I'anson and her team whilst working in association with Mileece's father, Nick Abson, who pioneered the largest fuel cell company in Europe. This is a great opportunity to use your skills to heighten the marketing of Mileece's PiP technology (People's interface for Plants), whilst gaining experience from leading figures in this field.

We are looking for vibrant creatives to be part of our current projects which see environmental creatives meet. The internship would last a month with potential extension into paid work. For this role we are looking for an intern who is studying/has experience in Business development in order to provide analytic feedback and strategic planning as the organisation moves into the next stage of its development.
